title: How to Drop 100lbs, Fast and Forever!
description:
Weight loss has become a third rail conversation in the United States, but it’s arguably the number one killer of Americans. But if that doesn’t motivate you, maybe better sex, better energy, better sleep, better digestion, better immunity and more will. In this episode, Jillian gives all the practical advice of what to do and why to do it to lose the weight permanently. You’ll even hear from a woman who lost 104 pounds and kept it off. Learn how she did it and be inspired to know that you can do it too! 


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Jillian Michaels Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1880466198675549

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
